name: Traveler's Fault
description:
Help Timothy collect coins!

Use Arrow keys to move & jump. Left shift to dash. Press the Escape key to pause. 

Note: Dashing only works if you are already moving to the left or right. 

Used the following assets:

https://o-lobster.itch.io/platformmetroidvania-pixel-art-asset-pack by o_lobster

This game was made by Ayush Sagar

Thanks for Playing!
